programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: On vacation, love relationship gets more complicated. What happened between Eun Ha Won and Kang Ji Woon?

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: After coming back from vacation, Park Hye Ji gets hurt by Kang Hyeon Min and goes to Kang Ji Woon.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon and Eun Ha Won takes a drive together. However, Kang Ji Woon gets an urgent call from someone.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Park Hye Ji’s enter to Haneul House makes Eun Ha Won kind of nervous. Hye Ji’s lie badly disappoints Ha Won.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: The shocking news strikes Eun Ha Won. Kang Ji Woon comforts her, but she is not sure what his real heart is.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Eun Ha Won and Kang Ji Woon finally starts dating but has to keep it secret because of CEO Kang’s rule.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon discovers the truth of his parents and leaves Haneul House. Eun Ha Won tries to convince him.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon decides to get a surgery for CEO Kang which also can put his life in danger.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Eun Ha Won pleads to take care of unconscious Kang Ji Woon but CEO Kang is stiff. Would there be happy ending?

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Tae Sik and Yeon Ju meet Gyeo Re while fulfilling the final wish of the dying ex-captain of Team Genie.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Gyeo Re becomes Team Genie's new ambulance driver, and they receive their first patient Mr. Pyeon.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Gyeo Re is touched by Mr. Pyeon's family, while Tae Sik works to fulfill the dream of a young cancer patient.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Preparations for Se Hee's musical commence, despite Tae Sik failing to convince Gyu Tae.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Se Hee's final wish of a musical is granted, bringing loved ones together and helping Gyu Tae make amends.

programme.title: If You Wish Upon Me
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 If You Wish Upon Me
programme.desc: Wanting to fulfill her boyfriend's final wish, Seo Jin enlists Gyeo Re to help her.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Martwi ludzie
programme.desc: Na bezprawnym Starym Zachodzie, dwóch braci wyrusza w pełną niebezpieczeństw podróż. Ich celem jest pomszczenie śmierci ojca, ochrona plemienia Apaczów, które kochają, i odzyskanie należnych im ziem oraz złota. W trakcie wyprawy będą musieli zmierzyć się z licznymi zagrożeniami i trudnymi decyzjami, a ich więź braterska zostanie wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Niekończąca się Masakra
programme.desc: Szeryf zawieszony za nadmierną brutalność walczy ze skorumpowanymi władzami i bandytami.

programme.title: Pojedynek ranczerów
programme.desc: Amerykański western w wersji z polskim lektorem - Pojedynek ranczerów.Spór o spadek po zmarłym ranczerze przeradza się w krwawy konflikt.

programme.title: Nawet Django ma Swoją Cenę
programme.desc: Narzeczona Django została uprowadzona. Ten musi ją uratować, ale nie jest to takie proste. Porywaczami są bracia Cortez i ich gang.

programme.title: Ostatni Zabójca
programme.desc: Rodzice Ramona zostają zabici przez ludzi właściciela ziemskiego Johna Barretta. Próbując się zemścić, Ramon zostaje ranny, ale udaje mu się uratować życie Rezzy, staremu, zdesperowanemu rewolwerowcowi.

programme.title: Rzeka Złoczyńców
programme.desc: Po napadzie na pociąg Roy King traci łup i serce przez zdradliwą Alicię. Ściga ją aż do Meksyku, gdzie wraz z jej nowym mężem Montero wikła się w plan rewolucjonistów: milion dolarów za zniszczenie arsenału. Kusząca nagroda prowadzi jednak do zdrad, intryg i niebezpiecznej gry o życie, pieniądze i miłość.

programme.title: Wielebny Colt
programme.desc: Do Tucson przybywa wielebny Miller z planem budowy kościoła. W dniu jego przyjazdu zostaje obrabowany bank. Mieszkańcy Tucson, podejrzliwi wobec nowego wielebnego, bo ten nosi przy sobie broń, natychmiast obwiniają go o napad.

programme.title: Hannie Caulder
programme.desc: Hannie Caulder traci męża i dom w brutalnym ataku braci Clemensów. Sama zgwałcona i pozostawiona na śmierć, poprzysięga zemstę. Wynajmuje łowcę nagród Thomasa Price’a, by wyszkolił ją na rewolwerowca. Uzbrojona w nowe umiejętności, wyrusza, by wymierzyć sprawiedliwość oprawcom.

programme.title: Egzekucja
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Clips ściga Johna Colera, który oszukał go i zagarnął całe złoto ze wspólnego napadu dla siebie. Clips w końcu dopada swoją ofiarę, ale to nie ten Coler, którego szukał. W rzeczywistości to młodszy brat zbiega, Bill, który pracuje w wędrownym cyrku.

programme.title: Bezbożnicy
programme.desc: Banita i łowca nagród poszukują meksykańskiego bandyty Corbancho, który grasuje w okolicach El Paso, obrabował bank w Tuscon i uciekł z 400 000 dolarów.

programme.title: Zabójca w Czerni
programme.desc: W Tombstone nowy szeryf przysięga oczyścić miasto z bandytów, takich jak bracia O'Hara, a pomaga mu w tym dziwaczny prawnik, który zawsze nosi przy sobie dwie duże księgi prawnicze.

programme.title: Kto pragnie zemsty?
programme.desc: Dwóch rewolwerowców wjeżdża do miasta z planem odebrania dużej, acz niezasłużonej nagrody. Zostają wplątani w lokalną wojnę o ziemię związaną ze zbliżającą się budową kolei.

programme.title: Dwa Rewolwery i Tchórz
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen, młody rewolwerowiec, który pracuje jako cyrkowiec, jest świadkiem zabójstwa kilku banitów dokonanego przez ich przywódcę. Sam zostaje uznany za winnego tego czynu. Steffen cierpi na kompleks, który blokuje go przed jakąkolwiek przemocą i sprawia, że wydaje się tchórzliwy. Kiedy młody chłopiec zostaje porwany, musi znaleźć sposób, aby odzyskać spokój.

programme.title: Żadnych Grobów na Cmentarzu
programme.desc: Jerry, Reno i Paco trafiają do więzienia, gdzie spotykają młodego Meksykanina, który twierdzi, że został skazany za przestępstwo, którego nie popełnił.

programme.title: Przeżegnaj się Nieznajomy
programme.desc: Łowca nagród chce schwytać bandytę imieniem Carson, ponieważ jego gang jest wart dużo pieniędzy.

programme.title: Zimny Zabójca
programme.desc: José Desman zabija swojego pracodawcę, pana Salazara, byłego sędziego, który skazał jego ojca na śmierć.

programme.title: Trumna Dla Szeryfa
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen wciela się w rolę Shenandoah, człowieka zagadki, który dołącza do złowrogiej bandy rozbójników po przejściu niemal niemożliwej do wykonania i wymagającej śmierci inicjacji.

programme.title: Apache Rose
programme.desc: Roy jest poszukiwaczem ropy naftowej. Stara się uzyskać prawa do odwiertów na starej hiszpańskiej hacjendzie. Roy wpada w konflikt z szajką hazardzistów z pływającego kasyna, którzy są zdeterminowani, by przejąć hacjendę.

programme.title: Gdzie Śmierć Zbiera Żniwo
programme.desc: Dwie nienawidzące się rodziny od zawsze spędzają czas na wzajemnym zabijaniu się. Córka z rodziny Campos i syn z rodziny Mounter zakochują się w sobie - końca nienawiści nie widać.

programme.title: Twardziel z Arizony
programme.desc: Marshal Matt Landry pojmuje bandytę Girarda, lecz jego bracia odbijają go i napadają na dyliżans ze srebrem. Dzięki telegramom i zeznaniom dziewczyny Girarda Landry odkrywa zdradę telegrafisty, który miał być martwy. Znając kryjówkę gangu, rusza w pościg, by wymierzyć sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Dni Przemocy
programme.desc: W ostatnich miesiącach wojny secesyjnej brat Joego zostaje niesprawiedliwie zabity przez Clifforda, kapitana armii północnej. Joe postanawia dołączyć do grupy południowców zdeterminowanych, by stawiać opór do końca.

programme.title: Kolej Canadian Pacific
programme.desc: Tom Andrews odkrywa przejście przez Góry Skaliste dla kolei, lecz handlarz futrami Rourke sabotuje budowę i rywalizuje o Cecille. Tom zostaje ranny przez sabotaż, ratuje go transfuzja. Cecille odkrywa zdradę ojca i konfrontuje Rourke’a, uciekając przed nim.

programme.title: Tropiciele
programme.desc: Jeff poprzysięga zemstę na pięciu bandytach, którzy zniszczyli życie jego siostry. Każdemu z nich zostawia ślad – fragment jej poncza. Brutalna, intensywna historia o bólu, sprawiedliwości i determinacji.

programme.title: Kasztanek
programme.desc: Chłopiec z rancza dostaje kucyka. Chłopiec go kocha, ale ten ucieka. Zaczyna się niespodziewana i tragiczna w skutkach historia.

programme.title: Apaczka
programme.desc: Tommy jest niewinnym oficerem kawalerii, który zakochuje się w pięknej kobiecie Apaczów (Yara Kewa) po uratowaniu jej od paskudnego przemytnika broni o imieniu Honest Jeremy.

programme.title: Doktor Złote Ręce
programme.desc: Były chirurg Doc McGregor jest teraz karciarzem. Zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i ścigany przez Slade'a, łowcę nagród.

programme.title: Nieokiełznany
programme.desc: Po zabójstwie ojca, agenta federalnego, młody prawnik Mitch Baker jedzie do Mission w Teksasie, by odnaleźć zabójców. Trop prowadzi do gangu przemytników broni. Mimo ostrzeżeń szeryfa, Mitch działa sam, a w Mission spotyka Angelitę, która budzi w nim uczucia i nadzieję.

programme.title: Piętnaście Stryczków Dla Mordercy
programme.desc: Oskarżeni o ohydną zbrodnię, której nie popełnili, członkowie dwóch rywalizujących ze sobą gangów uciekają przez rozwścieczonym tłumem. Chronią się w opuszczonym forcie, biorąc wcześniej dwóch zakładników.

programme.title: Udanego Pogrzebu, Przyjacielu... Sartana Zapłaci
programme.desc: Legendarny bohater Sartana jest świadkiem brutalnej masakry. Jest gotów przeprowadzić śledztwo. Prawie wszyscy w maleńkim miasteczku Indian Creek zdają się chętni do wykupienia posiadłości ofiar morderstwa...

programme.title: Może Bóg ci wybaczy... lecz nie ja
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango jest z dala od swojego rancza, sześciu bandytów atakuje i zabija wszystkich członków jego rodziny.

programme.title: Jeden po Drugim
programme.desc: Na granicy Teksasu i Meksyku, podczas wojny secesyjnej, pułkownik Greyson został oskarżony o zdefraudowanie 500 000 dolarów, które miał dostarczyć dowództwu Konfederacji.

programme.title: Trzy Dolary Ołowiu
programme.desc: Rudy wraca do domu, by zemścić się za śmierć ojca, którego zabili miejscowi bandyci.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Zabójcy z Dakoty
programme.desc: Ranczer Ed Sampson chce pozbyć się osadników i zleca podpalenie domu Martinów. Ginie ojciec, a syn Joe trafia na drogę zemsty. Emerytowany rewolwerowiec Ned East ratuje go przed prowokacją Beckera. Sampson zatrudnia Clinta Jonesa do zastraszania Squattersów, lecz ten ratując narzeczone z napadu, sam zaczyna pożądać wybranki Joe.

programme.title: Krwawa Dziewiątka
programme.desc: Oddział kawalerii zostaje wybity w zasadzce, ocala jedynie sierżant z córką i siedmiu brutalnych więźniów. Bez koni i wagonu muszą przedzierać się przez góry. Sierżant staje przed desperackim zadaniem: doprowadzić skazańców do więzienia, chronić córkę i odkryć, który z nich zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Nieznajomy w Paso Bravo
programme.desc: Drifter powraca do małego miasteczka, by pomścić morderstwo żony i córki.

programme.title: Legenda o samotnym jeźdźcu
programme.desc: Młody Strażnik Teksasu John Reid jako jedyny przeżywa zasadzkę zorganizowaną przez przywódcę renegatów Bartholomew "Butcha" Cavendisha. Przeżyć pomaga mu stary przyjaciel z dzieciństwa Komancz Tonto. Kiedy John dojdzie do siebie i wyliże rany, poświęci życie walce z przestępczością. John Reid stanie się zamaskowanym bohaterem zachodu, Samotnym Jeźdźcem. Z pomocą Tonto dwójka bohaterów wyrusza na ratunek prezydentowi Ulyssesowi S. Grantowi, gdy Cavendish bierze go za zakładnika. Dowiadujemy się, że Cavendish był oficerem w armii Stanów Zjednoczonych, zanim stanął przed sądem wojennym i został niehonorowo zwolniony.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 46, 47
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Dorwać Chaco
programme.desc: Chaco to Meksykanin, który zdaje się uciekać przed każdym. Zostaje oskarżony o morderstwo paru bydlaków.

programme.title: Zasadzka
programme.desc: W 1866 roku agent James Barlow przenika do gangu braci Reno, terroryzującego Seymour w Indianie. Udając przestępcę, zdobywa ich zaufanie, lecz zakochuje się w Laurze Reno, siostrze bandytów. Konflikt lojalności i przygotowywany napad na pociąg prowadzą do dramatycznego finału.

programme.title: Pojedynek Kogutów
programme.desc: Dwóch oszustów niszczy lokalną gospodarkę małego miasteczka, które odwiedzają... ale potem zakochują się w dwóch młodych kobietach spokrewnionych z bogatymi właścicielami ziemskimi, którzy są celem ich głównego oszustwa.

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango wygrywa w pokera worek złota, gangi El Tigre i Don Pablo atakują go. Podczas leczenia ran, Cjamango zaprzyjaźnia się z meksykańskim chłopcem Manuelem i piękną dziewczyną, Perlą.

programme.title: Bliżej Boga: Podróż Jessiki
programme.desc: Wiara matki zostaje wystawiona na próbę, gdy jej córka umiera na raka, a jej wyobcowany ojciec powraca.

programme.title: CainAbel
programme.desc: W każdej rodzinie jest dobro i zło. Pokolenie, które poświęca się, by uchronić swoją rodzinę przed zniszczeniem, może przekląć i skazać na zagładę obecne i przyszłe pokolenia.

programme.title: Wszystko w Swoim Czasie
programme.desc: Charlie rzuca pracę i przenosi się do domu, by kierować zespołem rockowym z rodzinnego miasta. Jego wspierająca dziewczyna podziela jego miłość do zespołu, aż do momentu, gdy walka w zespole zmusza ich do dokonania wyborów, które na zawsze wpłyną na ich życie.

programme.title: Tandem Hearts
programme.desc: Przeprowadzka do Portland w Oregonie i znalezienie pracy w gastronomii jest łatwe dla Paula i Ramony. Zmagający się z problemami muzyk, pozbawiony kolegów z zespołu, Paul staje się introwertyczny i nastrojowy.

programme.title: Check Point
programme.desc: Port City w Północnej Karolinie: Podczas rutynowego biwaku miejscowy włóczęga, który był dawnym żołnierzem piechoty morskiej, natrafia na plany inwazji na Amerykę

programme.title: Boże Dopomóż!
programme.desc: W tej komedii o seksualnych skandalach w kościele Rain pojawiają się przerysowane osobowości i chaos.

programme.title: Piraci z wybrzeża
programme.desc: Wspaniała, barwna włoska epopeja kostiumowa z Barkerem w roli kapitana statku, który musi zmierzyć się z przebiegłymi piratami. Film ma kilka interesujących zwrotów akcji i mnóstwo niespodziewanych wątków.

programme.title: Osadzony
programme.desc: Weteran wojenny Ray trafia do brutalnego więzienia za obronę swojej narzeczonej. Wśród przemocy, układów i manipulacji ze strony naczelnika, walczy o przetrwanie. Jego jedynym celem jest wyjść z więzienia i wrócić do ukochanej.

programme.title: Tajemnica Kansas City
programme.desc: Były skazaniec próbuje uczciwego życia, ale zostaje wrobiony w kradzież miliona dolarów. By oczyścić swoje imię, rusza do Meksyku, gdzie wpada na trop bandytów i skorumpowanego policjanta. Wciągający noir z dynamiczną akcją i tajemnicą do rozwiązania.

programme.title: Wojna Uczuć
programme.desc: W 1946 roku grupa niemieckich jeńców omyłkowo trafia do radzieckiego kobiecego obozu przejściowego i pod dowództwem okrutnego komendanta obozu Pawłowa musi zmierzyć się z wrogością radzieckich więźniarek i strażniczek.

programme.title: Rozdział 27
programme.desc: Film o Marku Davidzie Chapmanie w dniach poprzedzających niesławne morderstwo Beatlesa Johna Lennona.

programme.title: Zniszczenie
programme.desc: W środku nocy Donovan jedzie ze swoją dziewczyną Lucy i kilkoma przyjaciółmi na sekretne spotkanie w lesie.

programme.title: Brutalna Rzeczywistość
programme.desc: Wyszkolony przez FBI neuropsycholog łączy siły ze złodziejką, by znaleźć urządzenie zmieniające rzeczywistość, podczas gdy jej szalony były szef próbuje ich schwytać.

programme.title: Pułapka na ośmiornice
programme.desc: Mężczyzna przeżywający załamanie nerwowe odnajduje jedyną rzecz, bez której nie może żyć i zaraz potem ją traci. Nie może przywrócić kobiety, którą kocha, ale może pokryć ziemię krwią swojego wroga.

programme.title: Odzyskując Przyjaźń
programme.desc: Dlaczego bezwzględnego biznesmena miałaby nagle interesować przyjaźń? Być może po to, by odzyskać coś, o czym nigdy nie wiedział, że to stracił?

programme.title: Niesprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Tajemnicza postać przetrzymuje zakładników, aby wymusić zmiany. Dee postanawia, że jedynym sposobem, aby skłonić rząd do wysłuchania jej potrzeb, jest przetrzymywanie ludzi jako zakładników. Grozi im pozbawieniem życia wbrew prostym zasadom, które jej zdaniem powinny się zmienić. W miarę gdy jej działania wymykają się spod kontroli, Dee stara się zachować spokój, gdy wszystko zamienia się w chaos.

programme.title: Entliczek Pentliczek
programme.desc: Raul, kierowca holownika w Miami Beach, uczy się, że każdy wybór ma swoje nagrody i konsekwencje.

programme.title: Przyjaciółki, Wroginie i Fajerwerki
programme.desc: Grupa przyjaciółek spotyka się na przyjęciu sylwestrowym. Wracają dawne napięcia i dawne rywalizacje. Noc pogrąża się w chaosie, a iskry i rewelacje lecą jak fajerwerki.

programme.title: Ukryte Piękno
programme.desc: Zderzają się światy pogrążonego w depresji psychologa i rozchwianej emocjonalnie bezdomnej kobiety. Próbując ją ratować, zakochują się w sobie, a każde z nich dostaje drugą szansę na nowe życie.

programme.title: Gęsto
programme.desc: To opowieść o wschodzącej magnatce nieruchomości THERESIE JAMES, która dla dodatkowych korzyści finansowych prowadzi w swojej dzielnicy nielegalne interesy.

programme.title: Darowany koń
programme.desc: Po stracie matki Amanda pracuje na ranczu biznesmena. Gdy jego córka odrzuca nowego konia, dziewczyna postanawia go trenować. Odkrywając talent Misty, odzyskuje nadzieję i radość.

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Dzień Pierwszy
programme.desc: Dwie bratnie dusze zostają uwięzione razem pod koniec III wojny światowej, a ich życia zostają na zawsze splecione.

programme.title: Po zmroku
programme.desc: Gregory i Matilda wybierają się na weekendową wycieczkę do małego miasteczka Chama w Nowym Meksyku. Gdy wrócą do domu zostaną wciągnięci w tajemniczą serię wydarzeń.

programme.title: Burza: Powrót Thora
programme.desc: Powrót Thora. Grupa religijnych gorliwców znanych jako The Death Risers ma szatański plan zniszczenia świata poprzez sprowadzenie na Ziemię czczonego przez nich nordyckiego boga: Bogini Nieumarłych, znana jako Hel!

programme.title: Ostateczna sprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Kiedy członek rodziny jednego z nich zostaje zaatakowany, zespół byłych elitarnych żołnierzy zostaje wezwany do akcji. Rozpoczyna się bezwzględna gra, której zasady są proste: zabijaj i nie daj się zabić.

programme.title: Drastyczne Środki
programme.desc: Małżeństwo z problemami wyjeżdża na weekend za miasto. Para wkrótce napotyka niespodziewanych gości, którzy rzucają im wyzwanie na każdym kroku.

programme.title: Komfort
programme.desc: Nocny kurier zgadza się odebrać zadziorną córkę ważnego klienta. Dwoje młodych ludzi nawiązuje bliską więź i spędza dwie noce na poznawaniu lokalnej sceny kulinarnej Los Angeles, podczas gdy ich romans rozkwita.

programme.title: Miłość Jest Wrogiem Wielkiej, Głuchej Pustki
programme.desc: Pogrążony w cieniu dwóch dysfunkcyjnych romantycznych związków Hank wkracza w świat depresji przenikającej się z nowymi możliwościami. Kiedy poznaje niejaką Rose, wpadając na nią wiele razy w miejscach publicznych, zaczyna się między nimi romans w sposób, w jaki większość ludzi przeżywa przygodę na jedną noc. Hank walczy o sens życia, jako bezrobotny miłośnik przesypiania całych dni i nieudolny w utrzymaniu funkcjonalnego związku ze swoją byłą narzeczoną, Jill. Dopiero brutalne przebudzenie podczas intymnego wieczoru z Jill sprawia, że świat Hanka całkowicie się załamuje. Kiedy już wydaje się, że nic mu się nie uda, Hank znajduje nowy powód do życia.

programme.title: 6 Niepalących
programme.desc: Dr Henry Caldwell, najlepszy mediator na świecie, staje przed największym wyzwaniem w swojej karierze, kiedy przyjmuje sześciu współlokatorów, których jedyną wspólną cechą jest to, że żaden z nich nie pali.

programme.title: Witaj w klanie mężczyzn
programme.desc: Grupa samopomocy popada w chaos, gdy długotrwałe konflikty zaczynają zagrażać zaufaniu między mężczyznami.

programme.title: Ostatnia Wola Elijah
programme.desc: Lawrence Shaw pracuje jako specjalista w agencji reklamowej. Ludzie po prostu nie mogą zaakceptować go za to, kim jest.

programme.title: Evol - Teoria Miłości
programme.desc: 17-letni chłopak z problemami zostaje zmuszony do przeprowadzki do Nowego Jorku na terapię. Przez całe lato pozna nie tylko brutalność życia, ale także realia miłości.

programme.title: Chelsea
programme.desc: Kiedy najlepsza przyjaciółka Chelsea, Laura, zaręcza się i wyprowadza z ich mieszkania, zostaje jej coś więcej niż tylko pusty pokój.

programme.title: Tarzan i Zielona Bogini
programme.desc: Lord Greystoke, czyli Tarzan, opowiada o przygodach w Gwatemali, gdzie pomagał majorowi Martlingowi i Uli Vale w poszukiwaniu Zielonej Bogini. Totem, w którym ukryta była formuła materiału wybuchowego, jest celem bandytów i prymitywnych plemion. Tarzan musi stawić czoła niebezpieczeństwom, by ocalić totem.

programme.title: Zwyczajna Rodzina
programme.desc: Cztero osobową rodzinę dopada ich ukryte życie, izolacja od siebie nawzajem i przeszłość. Kulminacją jest jedyna rzecz, której unikali... konfrontacja. Rodzina rozpada się, gdy żona i matka ukrywa swój alkoholizm, a mąż próbuje ukryć swoje pożądanie do innej kobiety. Córka eksperymentuje z seksem, narkotykami i alkoholem, a syn tworzy sobie wyimaginowanego przyjaciela, który jest jego opiekunem.

programme.title: Szczyt Druida
programme.desc: Zbuntowany nastolatek trafia do ojca, strażnika parku, gdzie odkrywa niezwykłą więź z wilkami. Jego pasja do tych majestatycznych zwierząt zmienia jego życie i pomaga mu odnaleźć swoje miejsce w świecie.

programme.title: Nieubłagana Sprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Była agentka australijskiego wywiadu Victoria De Vries, wiedzie spokojne życie na przedmieściach Ameryki, gdzie jako samotna matka wychowuje jedyną córkę i prowadzi zajęcia we własnej szkole M.M.A. Kiedy jej córka wyjeżdża na kemping i nie wraca, Victoria jest zmuszona wrócić do akcji.

programme.title: Zabójstwo Niewinności
programme.desc: Nowy pastor dowiaduje się, jak ważne jest zapewnienie stabilności, uzdrowienia i nadziei po tym, jak podwójne zabójstwo wstrząsa jego społecznością.

programme.title: Boone - Łowca Nagród
programme.desc: Kiedy Boone, łowca nagród z reality show, szukający sławy, próbuje zniszczyć narkotykowego lorda i jego imperium, odkrywa więcej, niż się spodziewa i dowiaduje się, że sprawiedliwość znaczy więcej niż rankingi.

programme.title: Rozpacz
programme.desc: Po nagłej stracie małego syna Kyle Harden torturuje się dzień po dniu, wracając do swojego niegdyś szczęśliwego domu, w którym mieszkał razem z żoną i synem. Dziś zakończy cierpienie - dziś połączy się z synem - dziś okaże się najcięższym dniem w życiu Kyle'a Hardena, który stanie twarzą w twarz ze swoimi wewnętrznymi demonami, próbując "pociągnąć za spust" i coraz bardziej pogrążając się w psychologicznej dziurze miłości, straty i samopoznania, by odpowiedzieć na prawdziwe pytanie - "Czy zasługuję na to, by żyć?

programme.title: The Light of Western Stars
programme.desc: Knights of the sage-brush roar across the plains in this western drama from Harry Sherman Productions. Victor Jory ( Papillon, Gone With The Wind), stars as a ranch foreman wrongly arrested for murder. The memorable cast includes Tom Tyler (Stage Coach, Adventures of Captain Marvel), plus Noah Beery Jr (The Rockford Files) and in one of his earliest feature roles, Alan Ladd (The Blue Dahlia, Shane).

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Dave O'Brien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are sent to Oklahoma to investigate a hanging judge. Stoney's plan to go undercover backfires when he is framed for murder himself. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are assigned to investigate reports of an impostor posing as a U.S. Secret Service agent operating in Washington territory. In the guise of a government law officer, the man is shutting down all rivals of a saloon keeper's operating a crooked gambling establishment. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired in 1952 on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Quantrill and His Raiders
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective tasked with the mission to infiltrate the Quantrill gang before the Lawrence Kansas massacre.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Plus, Bruce Bennet stars as Quantrill, with Steve Darrell as Bloody Bill Anderson.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie investigate a woman named Cattle Kate who seems to be the source of cattle ranches suffering major losses in Sweetwater, Wyoming.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Cattle Kate: Jean Parker. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Judge Bean appoints himself as the legal guardian of a young man whose father was a member of an outlaw gang. Bean's reward -- the boy's uncle puts a $3000 bounty on his head ! Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge deals with a rigged election. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye is accused of the crimes committed by Ethan Allan and the Green Mountain boys. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A town starts to believe they are being cursed by a witch after a series of strange occurences. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Down Texas Way
programme.desc: The sixth film in Monogram's Rough Rider series once again follows Buck Roberts (Buck Jones), Tom McCoy (Tim McCall), and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) as undercover US Marshals posing as outlaws in order to confound their enemies. When Sandy is framed for murder by a gang of frontier racketeers who hope to take over a small town as their headquarters, Buck and Tom must work separately to save their buddy from a lynch mob and foil the crook's dastardly schemes.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: Roy Rogers finds himself elected sheriff in a wild Texas town after the Civil War. But can Roy handle a place under martial law? And can he save Gabby Hayes from being executed? And how many songs will he get to sing? Clear the burrs from your saddle and get ready for a good one, also starring Marjorie Reynolds, plus Sally Payne as Belle Starr, Queen of the Oklahoma Outlaws!

programme.title: Song of Arizona
programme.desc: This Roy Rogers adventure finds Gabby Whitaker (Gabby Hayes) running a ranch for wayward boys. One of the boys uses stolen money to help Gabby pay off his debts, but things unravel when the boys father, a notorious outlaw named King Blaine, is murdered; the rest of the Blaine gang show up at Gabbys looking for the loot! Director Frank McDonald works with a fine cast, including Dale Evans, Lyle Talbot, and of course, Roys beloved horse Trigger.

programme.title: Custer's Last Stand
programme.desc: The survivor of an Indian attack acquires a rare medicine arrow, and a menacing character named Blade (Reed Howes) will stop at nothing to take it from him. Elmer Clifton (Assassin of Youth, Seven Doors to Death) directs a memorable cast that includes Rex Lease (The Sign of the Wolf, The Monster Walks), Lona Andre (Slaves in Bondage, Death in the Air), and William Farnum (Samson and Delilah). Meanwhile, Frank McGlynn Jr is in the title role of General George A. Custer.

programme.title: Six Gun Trail
programme.desc: Legendary cowboy star Tim McCoy stars as Captain William Carson, who along with his sidekick Magpie does battle with jewel thieves. Its an actionfilled drama of the West, with plenty of blazing guns and heman adventure! There are a couple of songs, too, including Moon Over the Plains but they arent sung by Tim McCoy. He was too darned tough to sing! Also starring Nora Lane, Ben Corbet; directed by Sam Newfield.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Undercover US Marshal John Carruthers (John Wayne) is investigating a rash of robberies by a character known as The Polka Dot Bandit in this B-movie gem. Along the way, Carruthers finds himself in more trouble than he'd ever expected! Written and directed by Robert N. Bradbury, the film features George Gabby Hayes, Eleanor Hunt, and many other favorites of the era. Wayne was only 27 at the time of Blue Steel, but was well on his way to becoming The Duke.

programme.title: Outpost In Morocco
programme.desc: George Raft, Mary Windsor, and Akim Tamiroff star in this romantic drama from director Robert Florey (The Florentine Dagger, Daughter of Shanghai). Raft plays Capt. Gerard, a member of the Foreign Legion known for his romantic entanglements. He's assigned to escort an emir's daughter to her father's mountain citadel and learn about the emir's activities. Not surprisingly, Gerard finds trouble brewing! With footage shot in Morocco, this movie also features a beautiful musical score by twotime Oscar nominee Michel Michelet (Voice in the Wind).

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, it's up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. There's nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and it's all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Wagon Trail
programme.desc: The son of Sheriff Clay Hartley, of the frontier town Elder, has gotten into bad company and hangs out with an outlaw gang in which, Collins, owner of the Golden Rule Saloon, is the secret head. Sheriff Hartley suspects him, but has been unable to gather the needed evidence. Collins instructs his gang, including young Hartley, to hold up the stagecoach on its return trip from Missionary Flats and take the cargo of gold dust it is carrying. Sheriff Hartley is notified of the planned holdup by one of his deputies who has been spying on Collins, and organizes a posse. A deputy-sheriff is killed in the ensuing gunfight between the lawmen and the outlaws, but Deputy Joe Larkin, pursues and...

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwright's step in to make sure he'll be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adam's life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwright's to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshal's motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her father's honor after he's killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: Over the Hill Gang
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals are hired to clean up a lawless town. Starring Walter Brennan, Edgar Buchanan, Andy Devine, Jack Elam, Gypsy Rose Lee, and Rick Nelson.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's...

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: Across the Plains
programme.desc: Savagery! Murder! Renegade white men on the lawless frontier! Two young brothers are separated when their wagon train is attacked and their parents are killed. One brother is raised by Indians. The other falls in with a band of outlaws. Later, the brothers meet up on opposite sides of a battle. Addison Randall, Glenn Strange, and Hal Price star in this rugged tale from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barrett's gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A town blames the son-in-law of a the bank president for his murder. Cisco and Pancho work to uncover the truth before the townspeople hang the man. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951

Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.
